name: Asteroids, Inc.
description:
Strike it rich with Glorium!

Asteroids, Inc. is an idle narrative game where you'll take control of an asteroid mining company. Harvest the element Glorium from asteroids in order to make money, grow your business, and eventually change the world! All is not what it seems, however, and it's up to you to make the right decisions, especially since the asteroids are a finite resource ...

Credits

Aidan Andreasen ... Director / Designer

Andrew Gao ... Programmer

Ankie Pon ... Artist

Alec Graves ... Musician

Erin Overton ... Writing

Devanyn Alvarez ... Trailer Editor

Aidan Bacon ... Technical Advisor

Asteroids Inc. is still in early access so there are a few bugs and imperfections. It will exit early access soon.

ESRB Rating is purely stylistic. Asteroids Inc. is not high profile enough to be rated by the ESRB.
